msContents.summary: Majmūʻa (مجموعه) : a volume containing several works

msItem.title: ʻIshqnāmah
عشقنامه
msItem.note: Selected couplets from the mas̲navī-ʼi maʻnavī (مثنوی معنوی) of Jalāl al-Dīn Rūmī, Maulana, 1207-1273, جلال الدين رومى

listBibl.bibl: For a more detailed description see Waley 1998, page 58.

msItem.title: Marghūb al-qulūb
مرغوب القلوب
msItem.note: A didactic mas̲navī poem on Sufism and ethics

listBibl.bibl: For a more detailed description see Waley 1998, page 58.

msItem.title: Gulshan-i vaḥdat
گلشن وحدت
msItem.note: A mystical mas̲navī, mainly in Turkish but including prose passages in Persian

listBibl.bibl: For a more detailed description see Waley 1998, page 58.

msItem.textLang: Mainly in Turkish with prose in Persian

msItem.title: Az guftah-ʼi Shams-i Tabrīzī
از گفتۀ شمس تبریسی
msItem.note: Ghazals misattributed to Shams-i Tabrīzī, d. 1247, شمس تبريزى ; some possible by Jalāl al-Dīn Rūmī, Maulana, 1207-1273 جلال الدين رومى

listBibl.bibl: For a more detailed description see Waley 1998, page 58.

msItem.title: Suʼāl-i Jallā al-Dīn (sic) va javāb-i ʻIzz al-Dīn
سؤال جلا الدین و جواب عز الدین
msItem.note: Questions and answers, in verse, on aspects of Sufism

listBibl.bibl: For a more detailed description see Waley 1998, page 58.

msItem.title: Collection of poems
msItem.note: Poems by Humām, Muḥammad ibn Farīdūn, 1238?-1314 or 15, همام، محمد بن فريدون ; Niẓāmī Ganjavī, 1140 or 41-1202 or 3, نظامى گنجوى ; ʻAbd al-Razzāq, عبد الرزاق ; Khāqānī, Afz̤al al-Dīn Shirvānī, ca. 1126-1198 or 9, خاقانى ، افضل الدين شروانى ; and Sanāʼī al-Ghaznavī, Abū al-Majd Majdūd ibn Ādam, d. ca. 1150, سنايى غزنوى، ابو المجد مجدود ابن آدم

listBibl.bibl: For a more detailed description see Waley 1998, page 58.

msItem.title: Sharḥ-i Qaṣīdah-ʼi Yāftam-i Ḥaz̤rat-i Mawlānā
شرح قصیدۀ يافتم حضرة مولانا
msItem.note: Commentary in Turkish on a poem (actually a ghazal) attributed to Jalāl al-Dīn Rūmī, Maulana, 1207-1273 جلال الدين رومى

listBibl.bibl: For a more detailed description see Waley 1998, page 58.

msItem.title: Collection of poems
msItem.note: Poems in Persian by Ḥāfiẓ, 14th cent., ‏حافظ , Şahidî İbrahim Dede, 1470-1550, شاهدی ابراهيم دده , Jalāl al-Dīn Rūmī, Maulana, 1207-1273, جلال الدين رومى , Sulṭān Valad, 1226-1312, سلطان ولد , Shams-i Tabrīzī, d. 1247, شمس تبريزى (attributed), the poem of four half-times by ʻUnṣurī, Abū al-Qāsim Ḥasan, fl. 1009-1041, ‏عنصرى، ابو القاسم حسن , Farrukhī, ʻAlī ibn Jūlūgh, d. 1037 or 8, ‏فرخى ، على بن جولوغ , ʻAsjadī, ʻAbd al-ʻAzīz ibn Manṣūr, d. 1040 or 41, ‏عاسجدی، عبد العزیز بن منصور , Firdawsī, ‏فرداوسى ; and poems by various Turkish poets

listBibl.bibl: For a more detailed description see Waley 1998, page 58.

msItem.title: Dar bayān-i āfāq-i anfusī-ʼi Ḥaz̤rat-i Mawlānā
در بیان آفاق انفسی حضرت مولانا
msItem.note: A tract on the cosmological symbolism of the planets
Unconnected with Jalāl al-Dīn Rūmī, Maulana, 1207-1273, جلال الدين رومي، مولانا،

listBibl.bibl: For a more detailed description see Waley 1998, page 58.

msItem.title: Sharḥ-i ghazal-i Ḥāfiẓ
شرح غزل حافظ
msItem.note: Commentary on a ghazal of Ḥāfiẓ, 14th cent., ‏حافظ

listBibl.bibl: For a more detailed description see Waley 1998, page 58.

msItem.title: Poems, in Persian, Turkish, or Arabic
msItem.note: The Persian verses are by ʻAyyānī (sic), ‏عيانی , Ḥāfiẓ, 14th cent., ‏حافظ ,, Asīrī, ‏اسیری , Jāmī, 1414-1492, جامى , Kemalpaşazade, 1468 or 9-1534, ابن كمال باشا , Sulṭān Valad, 1226-1312, سلطان ولد , Shāhī, ‏شاهى , Shams-i Tabrīzī, d. 1247, شمس تبريزى (attributed), Karrāq-i Jangī, ‏کراق جنگی , and several naʼts, unattributed

listBibl.bibl: For a more detailed description see Waley 1998, page 58.

msItem.title: Poems in Persian
msItem.note: Poems by Jāmī, 1414-1492, جامى , verses by Ṣāʼib Tabrīzī, Muḥammad ʻAlī, d. ca. 1670, ‏صائب تبريزي، ميرزا محمد علي , and a rubāʻī

listBibl.bibl: For a more detailed description see Waley 1998, page 58.

msItem.title: Suʼāl va javāb dar bārah-ʼi Ḥadīs̲-i Kuntu kanzan makhfīyan
سعال و جواب در بارۀ حديث کنت کنزن مخفین
msItem.note: A treatise on the saying, often cited as a Ḥadīs̲ Qudsī, ”I was a hidden treasure”

listBibl.bibl: For a more detailed description see Waley 1998, page 58.

msItem.title: Untitled
msItem.note: A ghazal in Persian and some Turkish verses

listBibl.bibl: For a more detailed description see Waley 1998, page 58.

msItem.title: Untitled
msItem.note: Brief tracts, and an anonymous commentary on a bayt by Jāmī, 1414-1492, جامى

listBibl.bibl: For a more detailed description see Waley 1998, page 58.

msItem.title: Untitled
msItem.note: Selected verses from the Mas̲navī-i maʻnavī (مثنوى معنوى) , of Jalāl al-Dīn Rūmī, Maulana, 1207-1273, رومي جلال الدين محمد بن محمد مولانا

listBibl.bibl: For a more detailed description see Waley 1998, page 58.

msItem.title: Bulbulnāmah
بلبلنامه
Risālah-ʼi bulbulnāmah
رسالۀ بلبلنامه
msItem.note: A Sufi mas̲navī
Incorrectly attributed to ʻAṭṭār, Farīd al-Dīn, d. ca. 1230, عطار، فريد الدين ,
Main title has been supplied by Waley 1998, page 58.

listBibl.bibl: For a more detailed description see Waley 1998, page 58.

msItem.title: Futuvvatnāmah dar ṭālib-i Ḥaqq
فتوتنامه در طالب حق
msItem.note: A mystical mas̲navī poem

listBibl.bibl: For a more detailed description see Waley 1998, page 59.

msItem.title: Qalandarnāmah
قلندرنامه
msItem.note: A Sufi mas̲navī

listBibl.bibl: For a more detailed description see Waley 1998, page 59.

msItem.title: Dar bayān-i intikhāb-i Mas̲navī-i Mawlavī
در بیان انتخاب مثنوى مولوی
msItem.note: Selected lines from the Mas̲navī-i maʻnavī (مثنوى معنوى) , , of Jalāl al-Dīn Rūmī, Maulana, 1207-1273, رومي جلال الدين محمد بن محمد مولانا , withTurkish commentary

listBibl.bibl: For a more detailed description see Waley 1998, page 59.

msItem.title: Rawshanā’ī nāmah
روشنائینامه
msItem.note: A philosophical mas̲navī poem

listBibl.bibl: For a more detailed description see Waley 1998, page 59.

msItem.title: Dīvān-i Maghribī
دیوان مغربی
msItem.note: Collected lyric poems of Muḥammad Shīrīn Maghribī, d. 809/146-7

listBibl.bibl: For a more detailed description see Waley 1998, page 59.

msItem.title: Dīvān-i Maghribī
دیوان مغربی
msItem.note: Collected lyric poems of Muḥammad Shīrīn Maghribī, d. 809/146-7

listBibl.bibl: For a more detailed description see Waley 1998, page 41.

msItem.title: Vaṣāyā-yi Khwāja ʻAbd al-Khāliq Ghujduvānī
وصاياى خواجه عبد الخالق غجدوانی
msItem.note: Counsels on Sufism

listBibl.bibl: For a more detailed description see Waley 1998, page 59.

msItem.title: Untitled
msItem.note: Poems, mainly in Turkish
Persian verses by Jāmī, 1414-1492, جامى , in f. 133r, misattributed verses to Shams-i Tabrīzī, d. 1247, شمس تبريزى , in f. 133v, and unattributed in f. 135v

listBibl.bibl: For a more detailed description see Waley 1998, page 59.

msItem.title: Assorted qiṭaʻāt, mufradāt, and ghazals
msItem.note: Some of the poems are in Persian, others in Turkish

listBibl.bibl: For a more detailed description see Waley 1998, page 59.

msItem.title: Collection of poems
msItem.note: Poems or couplets by Sulṭān Valad, 1226-1312, سلطان ولد , , Ṣāʼib Tabrīzī, Muḥammad ʻAlī, d. ca. 1670, ‏صائب تبريزي، ميرزا محمد علي , in f. 198r-199v, a naʻt in f. 200r by Naẓīrī, d. 1613, نظيرى نيشاپوری , misattributed verses to Shams-i Tabrīzī, d. 1247, شمس تبريزى , in f. 200v; and numerous Turkish poets

listBibl.bibl: For a more detailed description see Waley 1998, page 59.

msItem.title: Bī sarnāmah
بی سرنامه
msItem.note: A Sufi mas̲navī formerly attributed, as here, to Farīd al-Dīn ʻAṭṭār

listBibl.bibl: For a more detailed description see Waley 1998, page 59.

recordHist.source: Manuscript description based on M. I. Waley: Supplementary handlist of Persian manuscripts, 1966-1998. London, 1998 and G.M. Meredith-Owens: Handlist of Persian Manuscripts, 1895-1966. Oxford, 1968

availability.p: Entry to read in the Library is permitted only on presentation of a valid reader's card for admissions procedures contact British Library, Registering for a Reader Pass. Contact apac-enquiries@bl.uk for further information on the availability of this manuscript. For information on catalogues and ordering manuscripts see Finding and ordering Persian manuscripts in the British Library.

revisionDesc.change: Julian Cook 850 BL Persian mss prepared for initial publication in FIHRIST (plus 18 replacements)
Julian Cook Assigned role(s) to every person having an id (Fihrist data cleanup project).
Julian Cook Changed person and work ids (Fihrist data cleanup project).
Andrew Morrison Updated key attributes using update-keys.xsl
James Cummings Up-converted the markup using https://github.com/bodleian/fihrist-mss/tree/master/processing/convertFihrist2Bodley.xsl
